settings.title: How Our Wholesale CBD Program Works
What is the discounted pricing for the wholesale program, and when will it be discussed?
settings.question_1: What is the discounted pricing for the wholesale program, and when will it be discussed?
settings.text_1: We offer discounted pricing for our wholesale program, which will be discussed once we receive and review your application.
settings.question_2: What is the return policy for wholesale purchases?
settings.text_2: We have a 60-day return policy for all wholesale orders. If you encounter any issues with your purchase, please reach out to our customer service team.
settings.question_3: Will I have a dedicated account manager for my wholesale account?
settings.text_3: Yes, you will have a dedicated account manager available Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM Pacific Time, to assist you with any inquiries or concerns.
settings.question_4: Is it legal to sell CBD in my state?
settings.text_4: Before proceeding with your wholesale order, we recommend verifying the legality of selling CBD products in your state. Some states have specific regulations regarding CBD sales.
settings.question_5: What is the minimum order quantity for wholesale purchases?
settings.text_5: The minimum order quantity for our wholesale program is 6 units. Please keep this in mind while placing your order.
settings.question_6: Where can I find more information about CBD
settings.text_6: You can find more information about CBD in our "Learn More" section on the website. Additionally, you can sign up for our newsletter or explore insightful blog posts. Feel free to call us if you have any specific questions.
settings.question_7: Do you offer free shipping for wholesale orders?
settings.text_7: Yes, we offer free shipping for all wholesale orders over $85. Take advantage of this offer to save on shipping costs.
settings.question_8: Is your pricing competitive compared to other wholesalers?
settings.text_8: Absolutely! We provide one of the largest wholesale discounts around, ensuring that you get the most competitive pricing for our high-quality CBD products.

settings.title: CBD Wholesale FAQ's
